text: Decipifus cingulatus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Kilburn R.N. & Marais J.P. (2010) Columbellidae. pp. 60–104, in: Marais A.P. & Seccombe A.D. (eds), Identification guide to the seashells of South Africa. Volume 1. Groenkloof: Centre for Molluscan Studies. 376 pp ==External links== * Category:Columbellidae Category:Gastropods described in 2009
title: Decipifus cingulatus
